name: Invasion (itch) (EroicPill)
description:
INVASION Demo Alpha 0.5

This is an Adventure game. It has some adult content, therefore be sure it is acceptable for you. 
This cyberpunk story about how new advancements  in VR,  AI, biotechnology  can invade our life. It is fantasy about our close future. Today's science develops very quickly. Nothing can stop human evolution. How far can we  go? How wide are our limits? 

In game you will find  story about the girl, who tries to handle her adult life in new world. She encountered with new cults, conspiracy, strange technologies. And she will find out, what is the true aim of INVASION.
